name: Auto Rickshaw Driving Pro
description:
Auto Rickshaw Driving Pro!!!
It's time to get off from super highway speed racing on luxury cars and sports vehicles and turn towards traditional passenger rickshaw driving. Get yourself ready to drive a tuk-tuk 3 wheel rickshaw on a rough mountain terrain environment with a lot of bumpy tracks and heavy jumps
Features:
Superb rickshaw drive and the best parking game
Become the best racer in this rickshaw racing game
Astonishing rickshaw driving experience in this tuk tuk simulator
Best rickshaw traffic racer game for the auto drivers
Challenging levels for ultimate fun and enjoyment
